profiles.name: Peter Mehrle
profiles.summary:
CEO Germany l Geschäftsführer bei Akkodis · It’s all about positive leadership culture. I believe in building and leading teams to bring innovation forward. In an environment of ambition, courage and respect I want to enable our people to grow their true passion for technologies and excellence in engineering.
I'm SVP Germany Akkodis, driving forward digital transformation and the future of mobility. For more than 10 years I have held management positions in the digital sectors with a focus on engineering service providers (ESP). With my in-depth international experience in R&D services, finance, M&A, PMI, corporate strategy and consulting, I aim to develop and efficiently manage companies – especially in the French-German and international context. Providing the best service to our clients is my priority.
Passion for technologies means passion for the needs of our customers. · Berufserfahrung: Akkodis · Standort: Stuttgart · 500+ Kontakte auf LinkedIn. Sehen Sie sich das Profil von Peter
